comments.message: Congratulations Saiful. A well deserved award. You have touched the hearts of many of our customers.

I must say whilst 580 awarded EXSA, there are staffs including a manager shamed you. Oct 1 Oct, around 6:15pm, my 7yo daughter bought an ice cream and happily came back to our table at Bt Merah Central outlet with ice cream dripping at the bottom of the cone. She went back to the last counter & told the Malay staff about it. Her Fantastic solution was asked her to use tissue to hold the cone! I went back to the counter and asked for a replacement, the  Manager (Malay lady), with a stern face, no word of apologies,

what's the point of singing praises when your everyday service standard just does not even meet the expected? Was with my beau at Plaza Singapura earlier this morn & order a bug breakfast. Upon ordering we were told they are out of hash brown and will take 10 mins to have them taken in from other restaurant?? My beau was ok w 10 so we waited. 10 became 20 n we saw hashbrown being served but still no breakfast. We went to the counter, checked with the manager and he sheepishly told us he is out of muffins and we need wait another 10! This is the service from McDonald's???? Almost unheard of couple of years back but now  almost a daily affair! Bravo
Congratulations Saiful Stewart.. U are always Awesome!!!!
well deserved saiful! We are proud of you! Keep the flame burning to influence others too

Any safety awards or compliments for your many dispatch drivers on Malaysian registered motorcycles, which are endangering pedestrians and motorists' safety on road everyday? My baby was almost knocked down by Mcdonald's dispatch motorcyclist driving on his Malaysian registered plate vehicle, yet the dispatch driver could shout at me and threaten me, what had Mcdonald's  had done after you complaint to them?  Getting their vendor to call me, so as to tell me it is none of Mcdonald's business,  as the dispatch drivers are outsourced. This atrocious driver is still driving around in neighbourhood for long hours for Mcdonald's until a fatal accident happen.

It's good tat u reward your well deserved staff.  But you should look into the bad behaviour of your manager at 51 amk ave 3.  I bought a filet o fish meal today n found tat only half pc of cheese inside.  Went to ask.  The mgr rudely said tat it's always like tat!
Btw, since when it's inky half pc of cheese in the fillet?
she handed me a replacement BUT with total dissatisfaction!
Congratulations to you Saiful! My boy like you so much! 😙
Saw him bef at Woodlands Civic Center McCafe.

11.post_text: This year, over 580 of our employees were awarded the Excellent Service Award (EXSA) for the food and beverage industry. At the awards ceremony this afternoon, our very own team member, Saiful, Customer Relations Manager, received the highest accolade in the restaurant category – the Super Star Award! A warm congratulations to Saiful and all our winners – we are proud and honoured to have all of you as part of the McDonald's Family!

How much healthier are your meals by just changing the muffins into whole grains ones? If i want to eat healthy, do you think i will still go to Mac? You have increased your prices time and again just on this past few years, and the servings of certain items, for example the fries, have gotten smaller and smaller, but yet the prices keep increasing...
